daily_take.headline: War odds spike as Iran strike bets flip from unlikely to coin flip
daily_take.deck: The US-Iran conflict market jumped 7 points overnight to 52.5%, crossing the threshold from "probably not happening" to genuine toss-up territory. Something shifted in the news cycle or geopolitical calculus. With $3.1M in volume, serious money is now pricing in an actual military confrontation before March 15.
